base_description: Brown cushioned office chair with wheels.
part_description: Includes a padded backrest, seat, armrests, and five-wheel base. The backrest and seat are rectangular with rounded edges. Armrests curve alongside the seat. The base is star-shaped with evenly spaced wheels.
internal_interaction_description: The backrest connects to the seat, providing support. Armrests are attached to the sides of the seat, enhancing comfort. The seat is mounted on a central support leading to the star-shaped base, which evenly distributes weight. Wheels enable smooth movement across surfaces.
external_interaction_description: The chair interacts with users by providing a comfortable seating option. It can be adjusted for height and moved easily due to its wheels. It complements office desks and can fit into various workspace environments, facilitating productivity and comfort.
